PricingPreview.description: Component that displays plan pricing cards

props.showAllLink: boolean - Show link to full plans page
props.limit: number - Number of plans to display

AffiliateLeaderboardWidget.description: Component that displays top affiliate performers

props.limit: number - Number of affiliates to show
props.showEarnings: boolean - Whether to display earnings amounts

hero.hero_title: Flexible Healthcare Plans for Brazilians in the USA
hero.hero_subtitle: Join thousands of families who have found quality health sharing solutions

features.features_subtitle: Discover the benefits that make SaudeMAX the preferred choice for healthcare
features.feature_1_description: Save up to 70% compared to traditional insurance
features.feature_2_description: Join a caring community of health-conscious members
features.feature_3_description: Personal guidance to navigate your healthcare plan

affiliate.affiliate_section_subtitle: Join our growing network of affiliate partners who are helping more people access quality healthcare
affiliate.affiliate_cta_description: Join our affiliate program and earn competitive commissions while helping others access quality healthcare solutions.
affiliate.affiliate_benefit_3_description: Get everything you need to succeed

health_plan.health_plan_subtitle: Comprehensive healthcare coverage designed specifically for the Brazilian community
health_plan.health_feature_1_description: Say goodbye to expensive and restrictive options.
health_plan.health_feature_4_description: Pre-approved surgeries can be performed in Brazil or the United States.
health_plan.health_feature_5_description: No need for Social Security or Credit Score to be approved.
health_plan.video_fallback_description: Learn about our comprehensive health plan designed for Brazilians

testimonials.testimonial_1_quote: SaudeMAX saved our family thousands while providing excellent coverage.
testimonials.testimonial_2_quote: SaudeMAX saved our family thousands while providing excellent coverage.
testimonials.testimonial_3_quote: SaudeMAX saved our family thousands while providing excellent coverage.

cta.cta_subtitle: Start your application today and Cut Your Medical Costs and Gain Peace of Mind

footer.footer_brand_description: Providing affordable healthcare sharing solutions for families across Brazil and beyond.

whatsapp.whatsapp_default_message: Hi there! I'm interested in learning more about SaudeMax plans.

build_configuration.optimization: Tree shaking enabled for lucide-react icons

performance_optimizations.image_optimization: Use optimized images with proper sizing
performance_optimizations.bundle_analysis: Keep track of bundle size with each new component

required_steps: 1. Install all required dependencies from framework_requirements
2. Set up Tailwind CSS with the provided color scheme
4. Replace all {{placeholder}} values with actual content
5. Implement navigation routing with React Router
7. Configure proper image optimization and loading
8. Test responsive design on all breakpoints

component_architecture.layout: Use the provided layout structure with Header > Main > Footer
component_architecture.routing: Each section link should route to appropriate pages
component_architecture.state_management: Use React hooks for local state, context for global state
component_architecture.error_handling: Implement proper error boundaries and fallback UI

styling_guidelines.custom_css: Minimize custom CSS, prefer Tailwind utilities
styling_guidelines.consistency: Use design tokens for consistent spacing, colors, and typography

testing_checklist: ✅ All buttons have proper hover states
✅ All sections are responsive on mobile/tablet/desktop
